textBox.richText: I Am Here to Educate the Masses

Hey guys—are you ready to LEARN?! I thought I’d like to share with you all a little piece of my educational endeavors this summer. It is a presentation about the Destructive Effects of Acid Rain on our very own Pine Barrens here on Long Island! Just click play on the slide and be amazed! Didn’t think you’d see educational material here? TOO BAD READ IT ANYWAY.
